content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case without mentioning the parties involved the case started on february 23rd 2023 in ghent and had a total cost of 156000 euros an additional 180000 euros was requested for procedural cost indemnity the procedure lasted for 2 years and 10 months the text outlines the following steps 1 one party filed a complaint against another party stating their issues and grievances 2 the defendant received a copy of the complaint to be aware of the allegations 3 the defendant had a specific time to respond admitting or denying the allegations and presenting counterclaims 4 both parties engaged in the discovery phase gathering evidence and exchanging information 5 the parties attempted to resolve the dispute through negotiation or mediation 6 if no settlement was reached the case proceeded to trial where arguments and evidence were presented 7 after the trial a verdict was delivered determining the outcome of the case 8 either party could appeal the decision requesting a higher court to review the case 9 the text does not provide information on the final outcome or further steps taken the judges decision addressed various points including the need for clear grievances in an appeal specific timeframes for objections to liquidation statements and the importance of a formal notice the decision partially upheld objections and instructed the notaryliquidator to gather more information and revise activities accordingly the case was sent back for adjustments and finalization the document also discusses objections raised by parties h and s regarding the division of assets and the liquidation of matrimonial property the interpretation of the marriage contract and ownership of specific assets were also mentioned the document concludes that further actions are required based on the courts decisions
